meanings.definition: To introduce (a new or different element) into something
meanings.sent1: She injects creativity into every project she works on.
meanings.sent2: The artist injects vibrant colors into her paintings.
meanings.sent3: The chef injects a burst of flavor into the dish with a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music injects life into the band's performances.
meanings.sent5: The storyteller injects magic into every tale she weaves.

meanings.definition: To introduce (a substance) into the body using a needle and syringe
meanings.sent1: The nurse injects the vaccine to protect against diseases.
meanings.sent2: He injects insulin daily to manage his diabetes.
meanings.sent3: The doctor injects a dose of humor before giving the shot to calm the patient.
meanings.sent4: The athlete injects determination like a shot of adrenaline before the race.
meanings.sent5: She injects courage into herself before facing the needle for blood donation.
